PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
Concentration is used to play certain cards.
Blast is a single use card that does damage.
Cursed creatures lose HP at the end of their turn. Each turn, Cursed is reduced by 5.
Elemental cards played with this power active will have an extra effect occur.
Receives more damage increasing with stacks. Increases by 1 each turn.
At three stacks, add Torrent to your hand and remove all stacks.
When attacked, transfer 15 Cursed to the attacker and remove one stack. Lose HP equal to count at end of turn.
